trans-unit.source: Director
trans-unit.target: Director

trans-unit.source: Directories can be created and removed using mkdir(), rmdir(), and the model will be automatically updated to take the changes into account.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用mkdir（），rmdir（）创建和删除目录，并且将自动更新模型以考虑更改。

trans-unit.source: Directories can be created with mkdir(), renamed with rename(), and removed with rmdir().
trans-unit.target: 可以使用mkdir（）创建目录，使用rename（）重命名目录，并使用rmdir（）删除目录。

trans-unit.source: Directories can be included or excluded using the showDirs property, navigation directories can also be excluded by setting the showDotAndDotDot property to false, hidden files can be included or excluded using the showHidden property.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用showDirs属性包含或排除目录，也可以通过将showDotAndDotDot属性设置为false 来排除导航目录，可以使用showHidden属性包含或排除隐藏文件。

trans-unit.source: Directories contain a number of entries, representing files, directories, and symbolic links. The number of entries in a directory is returned by count(). A string list of the names of all the entries in a directory can be obtained with entryList(). If you need information about each entry, use entryInfoList() to obtain a list of QFileInfo objects.
trans-unit.target: 目录包含许多条目，代表文件，目录和符号链接。目录中的条目数由count（）返回。可以使用entryList（）获得目录中所有条目名称的字符串列表。如果需要有关每个条目的信息，请使用entryInfoList（）获得QFileInfo对象的列表。

trans-unit.target: 禁用头保护。

trans-unit.source: Disable multi-sampling (anti-aliasing).
trans-unit.target: 禁用多重取样(抗锯齿)。

trans-unit.target: 禁用最后一页上的“ 后退”按钮。

trans-unit.source: Disabled
trans-unit.target: Disabled

trans-unit.source: Disabled actions cannot be chosen by the user. They do not disappear from menus or toolbars, but they are displayed in a way which indicates that they are unavailable. For example, they might be displayed using only shades of gray.
trans-unit.target: 用户不能选择已禁用的操作,但它们不会从菜单或工具栏中消失,而是以一种表明它们不可用的方式显示。它们不会从菜单或工具栏中消失,但它们的显示方式表明它们不可用。例如,它们可能只用灰色的阴影来显示。

trans-unit.source: Disabled by default.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下已禁用。

trans-unit.source: Disabled items are traditionally drawn using grayed-out colors (see QPalette::Disabled).
trans-unit.target: 传统上，禁用的项目使用灰色显示（请参阅QPalette :: Disabled）。

trans-unit.source: Disabled items are visible, but they do not receive any events, and cannot take focus nor be selected. Mouse events are discarded; they are not propagated unless the item is also invisible, or if it does not accept mouse events (see acceptedMouseButtons()). A disabled item cannot become the mouse grabber, and as a result of this, an item loses the grab if it becomes disabled when grabbing the mouse, just like it loses focus if it had focus when it was disabled.
trans-unit.target: 禁用的项目是可见的，但是它们不会收到任何事件，因此无法获得焦点或被选中。鼠标事件被丢弃；除非项目也不可见，或者不接受鼠标事件，否则不会传播它们（请参见acceptedMouseButtons（））。禁用的项目无法成为鼠标捕获器，因此，如果在捕获鼠标时禁用了该项目，则该项目失去了捕获，就像禁用时具有焦点的项目失去了焦点一样。

trans-unit.source: Disabled items cannot be triggered by the user. They do not disappear from menus, but they are displayed in a way which indicates that they are unavailable. For example, they might be displayed using only shades of gray.
trans-unit.target: 禁用的项目不能由用户触发,它们不会从菜单中消失,但它们的显示方式表明它们不可用。它们不会从菜单中消失,但它们的显示方式表明它们不可用。例如,它们可能只用灰色的阴影来显示。

trans-unit.source: Disabled text is "etched" as it is on Windows.
trans-unit.target: 被禁用的文本是 "蚀刻 "的,就像在Windows上一样。

trans-unit.source: Disabled text is dithered as it is on Motif.
trans-unit.target: 禁用的文字会像在Motif上一样进行抖动。

trans-unit.source: Disables QGraphicsView's antialiasing auto-adjustment of exposed areas. Items that render antialiased lines on the boundaries of their QGraphicsItem::boundingRect() can end up rendering parts of the line outside. To prevent rendering artifacts, QGraphicsView expands all exposed regions by 2 pixels in all directions. If you enable this flag, QGraphicsView will no longer perform these adjustments, minimizing the areas that require redrawing, which improves performance. A common side effect is that items that do draw with antialiasing can leave painting traces behind on the scene as they are moved.
trans-unit.target: 禁用QGraphicsView的暴露区域的抗锯齿自动调整功能。在其QGraphicsItem :: boundingRect（）的边界上呈现抗锯齿线的项目最终可能会在外部呈现线的一部分。为了防止呈现伪像，QGraphicsView将所有暴露区域在所有方向上扩大2个像素。如果启用此标志，则QGraphicsView将不再执行这些调整，从而最大程度地减少了需要重绘的区域，从而提高了性能。一个常见的副作用是，使用抗锯齿绘制的项目在移动时会在场景上留下绘画痕迹。

trans-unit.source: Disables SSL session sharing via the session ID handshake attribute.
trans-unit.target: 通过会话ID握手属性禁用SSL会话共享。

trans-unit.target: 禁用Vulkan调试输出（ VK_EXT_debug_report ）重定向到qDebug。

trans-unit.source: Disables Vulkan debug output (VK_EXT_debug_report) redirection to qDebug.
trans-unit.target: 禁用Vulkan调试输出（ VK_EXT_debug_report ）重定向到qDebug。

trans-unit.source: Disables automatic conversion from QString to 8-bit strings (char *).
trans-unit.target: 禁用从QString到8位字符串（char *）的自动转换。

trans-unit.source: Disables automatic conversions from 8-bit strings (char *) to unicode QStrings
trans-unit.target: 禁用从8位字符串(char *)到unicode QStrings的自动转换。

trans-unit.source: Disables automatic conversions from 8-bit strings (char *) to unicode QStrings, as well as from 8-bit char types (char and unsigned char) to QChar.
trans-unit.target: 禁用从8位字符串（char *）到unicode QStrings的自动转换，以及从8位char类型（char和unsigned char）到QChar的自动转换。

trans-unit.source: Disables automatic conversions from QByteArray to const char * or const void *.
trans-unit.target: 禁用从QByteArray到const char *或const void *的自动转换。

trans-unit.source: Disables automatic conversions from QString (or char *) to QUrl.
trans-unit.target: 禁用从QString（或char *）到QUrl的自动转换。

trans-unit.source: Disables automatic insertion of quotation characters around QChar, QString and QByteArray contents and returns a reference to the stream.
trans-unit.target: 禁止在QChar，QString和QByteArray内容周围自动插入引号字符，并返回对流的引用。

trans-unit.source: Disables automatic insertion of spaces and returns a reference to the stream.
trans-unit.target: 禁用自动插入的空格,并返回对流的引用。

trans-unit.source: Disables caching of shader program binaries on disk. By default Qt Quick, QPainter's OpenGL backend, and any application using QOpenGLShaderProgram with one of its
trans-unit.target: 禁用在磁盘上缓存着色器程序二进制文件。默认情况下，Qt Quick，QPainter的OpenGL后端以及使用QOpenGLShaderProgram以及其其中之一的任何应用程序

trans-unit.source: Disables caching. (Added in 5.7)
trans-unit.target: 禁用缓存。(在5.7中添加)

trans-unit.source: Disables high-DPI scaling in Qt, exposing window system coordinates. Note that the window system may do its own scaling, so this does not guarantee that QPaintDevice::devicePixelRatio() will be equal to 1. In addition, scale factors set by QT_SCALE_FACTOR will not be affected. This corresponds to setting the QT_AUTO_SCREEN​_SCALE_FACTOR environment variable to 0. This attribute must be set before QGuiApplication is constructed. This value was added in Qt 5.6.
trans-unit.target: 在Qt中禁用高DPI缩放，从而暴露窗口系统坐标。请注意，窗口系统可以自行缩放，因此不能保证QPaintDevice :: devicePixelRatio（）等于1。此外，由QT_SCALE_FACTOR设置的缩放因子也不会受到影响。这对应于将QT_AUTO_SCREEN_SCALE_FACTOR环境变量设置为0.必须在构造QGuiApplication之前设置此属性。这个值是在Qt 5.6中添加的。

trans-unit.source: Disables key modifiers on the emitted key.
trans-unit.target: 在发出的键上禁用键修改器。

trans-unit.source: Disables most automatic conversions from source literals and 8-bit data to unicode QStrings, but allows the use of the QChar(char) and QString(const char (&ch)[N] constructors, and the QString::operator=(const char (&ch)[N]) assignment operator. This gives most of the type-safety benefits of QT_NO_CAST_FROM_ASCII but does not require user code to wrap character and string literals with QLatin1Char, QLatin1String or similar.
trans-unit.target: 禁止从源文字和8位数据到Unicode QString的大多数自动转换，但允许使用 QChar(char) 和 QString(const char (&ch)[N] 构造函数，以及 QString::operator=(const char (&ch)[N]) 赋值运算符，它提供了 QT_NO_CAST_FROM_ASCII 的大多数类型安全优点，但不需要用户代码用QLatin1Char，QLatin1String或类似字符包装字符和字符串文字。

trans-unit.source: Disables remote access for the QObject
trans-unit.target: 禁用QObject的远程访问

trans-unit.source: Disables selecting the cipher chosen based on the servers preferences rather than the order ciphers were sent by the client. This option is only relevant to server sockets, and is only honored by the OpenSSL backend.
trans-unit.target: 禁用根据服务器的偏好而不是客户端发送密码的顺序来选择密码。这个选项只与服务器套接字相关,并且只被OpenSSL后端认可。

trans-unit.source: Disables storing the SSL session in ASN.1 format as returned by QSslConfiguration::sessionTicket(). Enabling this feature adds memory overhead of approximately 1K per used session ticket.
trans-unit.target: 禁用QSslConfiguration :: sessionTicket（）返回的以ASN.1格式存储SSL会话。启用此功能会为每个使用的会话票证增加大约1K的内存开销。

trans-unit.source: Disables support for C compiler extensions. By default, they are enabled.
trans-unit.target: 禁用对C编译器扩展的支持。默认情况下,它们是启用的。

trans-unit.source: Disables support for C++ compiler extensions. By default, they are enabled.
trans-unit.target: 禁用对C++编译器扩展的支持。默认情况下,它们是被启用的。

trans-unit.source: Disables the QProcess::start() overload taking a single string. In most cases where it is used, the user intends for the first argument to be treated atomically as per the other overload.
trans-unit.target: 使用单个字符串禁用QProcess :: start（）重载。在大多数情况下，用户希望将第一个参数按照其他重载的方式进行原子处理。

trans-unit.source: Disables the QProcess::start() overload taking a single string. In most cases where it is used, the user intends for the first argument to be treated atomically as per the other overload.
trans-unit.target: 使用单个字符串禁用QProcess :: start（）重载。在大多数情况下，用户希望将第一个参数与其他重载一样原子地对待。

trans-unit.source: Disables the QSessionManager. By default Qt will connect to a running session manager for a GUI application on supported platforms, use of a session manager may be redundant for system services. This attribute must be set before QGuiApplication is constructed. This value was added in 5.14
trans-unit.target: 禁用QSessionManager。默认情况下，Qt将连接到受支持平台上GUI应用程序的正在运行的会话管理器，会话管理器的使用对于系统服务可能是多余的。必须在构造QGuiApplication之前设置此属性。此值是在5.14中添加的

trans-unit.source: Disables the WindowContextHelpButtonHint by default on Qt::Sheet and Qt::Dialog widgets. This hides the ? button on Windows, which only makes sense if you use QWhatsThis functionality. This value was added in Qt 5.10. In Qt 6, WindowContextHelpButtonHint will not be set by default.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，在Qt :: Sheet和Qt :: Dialog小部件上禁用WindowContextHelpButtonHint。这隐藏了吗？Windows上的按钮，仅在使用QWhatsThis功能时才有意义。此值已在Qt 5.10中添加。在Qt 6中，默认情况下不会设置WindowContextHelpButtonHint。

trans-unit.source: Disables the SSL compression extension. When enabled, this allows the data being passed over SSL to be compressed, however some servers are not compatible with this extension.
trans-unit.target: 禁用SSL压缩扩展。启用后,允许通过SSL传递的数据被压缩,但有些服务器与该扩展不兼容。

trans-unit.source: Disables the SSL server name indication extension. When enabled, this tells the server the virtual host being accessed allowing it to respond with the correct certificate.
trans-unit.target: 禁用SSL服务器名称指示扩展。当启用时,这将告诉服务器正在访问的虚拟主机,使其能够以正确的证书进行响应。

trans-unit.source: Disables the SSL session ticket extension. This can cause slower connection setup, however some servers are not compatible with the extension.
trans-unit.target: 禁用SSL会话票据扩展。这可能会导致较慢的连接设置,但有些服务器与该扩展不兼容。

trans-unit.source: Disables the class info generation for this ActiveX container. If you don't require any class information about the ActiveX control use this function to speed up the meta object generation.
trans-unit.target: 禁用这个ActiveX容器的类信息生成。如果你不需要任何关于ActiveX控件的类信息,使用这个函数来加速元对象的生成。

trans-unit.source: Disables the disk cache and forces re-compilation from source for all QML and JavaScript files.
trans-unit.target: 禁用磁盘缓存并强制所有QML和JavaScript文件从源头重新编译。

trans-unit.source: Disables the event sink implementation for this ActiveX container. If you don't intend to listen to the ActiveX control's events use this function to speed up the meta object generation.
trans-unit.target: 禁用此ActiveX容器的事件汇实现。如果你不打算监听ActiveX控件的事件,使用这个函数来加速元对象的生成。

trans-unit.source: Disables the insertion of empty fragments into the data when using block ciphers. When enabled, this prevents some attacks (such as the BEAST attack), however it is incompatible with some servers.
trans-unit.target: 当使用块密码时,禁止在数据中插入空碎片。启用后,可以防止某些攻击(如BEAST攻击),但它与某些服务器不兼容。

trans-unit.source: Disables the meta object generation for this ActiveX container. This also disables the event sink and class info generation. If you don't intend to use the Qt meta object implementation call this function to speed up instantiation of the control. You will still be able to call the object through dynamicCall(), but signals, slots and properties will not be available with QObject APIs.
trans-unit.target: 禁用此ActiveX容器的元对象生成。这也将禁用事件接收器和类信息生成。如果您不想使用Qt元对象实现，请调用此函数以加快控件的实例化。您仍然可以通过dynamicCall（）调用对象，但是QObject API 不能使用信号，插槽和属性。

trans-unit.source: Disables the older insecure mechanism for renegotiating the connection parameters. When enabled, this option can allow connections for legacy servers, but it introduces the possibility that an attacker could inject plaintext into the SSL session.
trans-unit.target: 禁用旧的不安全机制,重新协商连接参数。启用该选项后,可以允许为传统服务器进行连接,但会引入攻击者在SSL会话中注入明文的可能性。

trans-unit.source: Distance from the start of the paragraph. The position of a tab is from the start of the paragraph which implies that when the alignment of the paragraph is set to centered, the tab is interpreted to be moved the same distance as the left ege of the paragraph does. In case the paragraph is set to have a layoutDirection() RightToLeft the position is interpreted to be from the right side of the paragraph with higher numbers moving the tab to the left.
trans-unit.target: 从段落开始的距离。标签页的位置是从段落的开始,这意味着当段落的对齐方式被设置为居中时,标签页被解释为与段落的左边缘移动相同的距离。如果段落被设置为布局方向()RightToLeft,那么位置将被解释为从段落的右侧开始,数字越大,标签就会向左移动。

trans-unit.source: Do not assume that id numbers start at zero or that they are sequential. Such an assumption is often false due to the way the underlying drivers work.

trans-unit.source: Do not call this function if the dialog was constructed with the Qt::WA_DeleteOnClose attribute.

trans-unit.source: Do not call this function if the file has already been opened.
trans-unit.target: 如果文件已经被打开,请不要调用此函数。

trans-unit.source: Do not call this function while a QQmlEngine exists or behavior will be undefined. Any existing QQmlEngines must be deleted before calling this function. This function only affects the application global cache. Delete the QQmlEngine to clear all cached data relating to that engine.
trans-unit.target: 当存在QQmlEngine或行为不确定时，请勿调用此函数。调用此函数之前，必须删除所有现有的QQmlEngines。此功能仅影响应用程序全局缓存。删除QQmlEngine，以清除所有与该引擎有关的缓存数据。

trans-unit.source: Do not check whether the image contains non-opaque pixels. Use this if you know that the image is semi-transparent and you want to avoid the overhead of checking the pixels in the image until a non-opaque pixel is found, or if you want the pixmap to retain an alpha channel for some other reason. If the image has no alpha channel this flag has no effect.
trans-unit.target: 不检查图像是否包含非不透明像素。如果您知道图像是半透明的,并且您想避免检查图像中的像素直到找到非不透明像素的开销,或者如果您出于其他原因想让pixmap保留一个alpha通道,请使用这个标志。如果图像没有alpha通道,这个标志就没有效果。

trans-unit.source: Dock
trans-unit.target: Dock

trans-unit.source: Dock Widgets
trans-unit.target: 码头小部件

trans-unit.source: Dock nesting is only necessary in applications that contain a lot of dock widgets. It gives the user greater freedom in organizing their main window. However, dock nesting leads to more complex (and less intuitive) behavior when a dock widget is dragged over the main window, since there are more ways in which a dropped dock widget may be placed in the dock area.
trans-unit.target: 只有在包含大量停靠部件的应用程序中,停靠嵌套才是必要的。它让用户在组织主窗口时有更大的自由度。然而,当dock widget被拖到主窗口上时,dock嵌套会导致更复杂(且不太直观)的行为,因为有更多的方式可以将dock widget放置在dock区域。

trans-unit.source: Dock widgets are floating panels, often containing input widgets and more complex controls, that are either attached to the edges of the main window in "dock areas", or floated as independent tool windows.
trans-unit.target: Dock部件是浮动面板,通常包含输入部件和更复杂的控件,它们要么附着在 "dock区域 "的主窗口边缘,要么作为独立的工具窗口浮动。

trans-unit.source: Dock widgets are implemented in the QDockWidget class. A dock widget is a window that can be docked into the main window. You add dock widgets to a main window with addDockWidget().
trans-unit.target: Dock小部件在QDockWidget类中实现。停靠小部件是可以停靠在主窗口中的窗口。您可以使用 addDockWidget() 将停靠小部件添加到主窗口。

trans-unit.source: Dock widgets can be optionally floated as independent tool windows. Hence, it is useful to give them window titles by setting their windowTitle property. This also helps to identify them on the form.
trans-unit.target: 可以将Dock小部件作为独立的工具窗口浮动。因此，通过设置它们的windowTitle属性为它们提供窗口标题是很有用的。这也有助于在表单上识别它们。

trans-unit.source: Dock window title.
trans-unit.target: 停靠窗口标题。

trans-unit.source: Dock windows can be moved inside their current area, moved into new areas and floated (e.g., undocked) by the end-user. The QDockWidget API allows the programmer to restrict the dock widgets ability to move, float and close, as well as the areas in which they can be placed.
trans-unit.target: 停靠窗口可以在其当前区域内移动，移至新区域并由最终用户浮动（例如，取消停靠）。所述QDockWidget API允许程序员限制坞窗口小部件移动，浮子和关闭能力，以及其中它们可以被放置在的区域。

trans-unit.source: Dock windows can be moved inside their current area, moved into new areas and floated (e.g., undocked) by the end-user. The QDockWidget API allows the programmer to restrict the dock widgets ability to move, float and close, as well as the areas in which they can be placed.
trans-unit.target: Dock窗口可以在其当前区域内移动,移动到新的区域,并由终端用户浮动(例如,取消停靠)。QDockWidget API允许程序员限制Dock widget移动、浮动和关闭的能力,以及它们可以被放置的区域。

trans-unit.source: Documentation projects can link to Qt APIs and other articles by specifying the path to the qt.index file. When qdoc generates the Qt Reference Documentation, it will also generate an index file, containing the URLs to the articles. Other projects can use the links in the index file so that they can link to other articles and API documentation within Qt.
trans-unit.target: 通过指定 qt.index 文件的路径，文档项目可以链接到Qt API和其他文章。当qdoc生成Qt参考文档时，它还将生成一个索引文件，其中包含文章的URL。其他项目可以使用索引文件中的链接，以便它们可以链接到Qt中的其他文章和API文档。

trans-unit.source: Documentation projects can link to targets in other projects by specifying a set of dependencies, or a set of direct paths to to index file(s) this project depends on. When QDoc generates documentation for a project, it will also generate an .index file containing URLs to each linkable entity in the project. Other projects can then define a dependency to the index file in order to link to the documentation within that project.
trans-unit.target: 通过指定一组依赖项或指向该项目所依赖的索引文件的一组直接路径，文档项目可以链接到其他项目中的目标。当QDoc生成项目文档时，它还将生成一个 .index 文件，其中包含指向该项目中每个可链接实体的URL。然后，其他项目可以定义对索引文件的依赖关系，以便链接到该项目中的文档。

trans-unit.source: Documenting QML Types
trans-unit.target: 记录QML类型

trans-unit.source: Documents can be edited via the interface provided by the QTextCursor class; cursors are either created using a constructor or obtained from an editor widget. The cursor is used to perform editing operations that correspond exactly to those the user is able to make themselves in an editor. As a result, information about the document structure is also available through the cursor, and this allows the structure to be modified. The use of a cursor-oriented interface for editing makes the process of writing a custom editor simpler for developers, since the editing operations can be easily visualized.
trans-unit.target: 可以通过QTextCursor类提供的界面来编辑文档。游标要么使用构造函数创建，要么从编辑器小部件获得。光标用于执行与用户能够在编辑器中进行的操作完全对应的编辑操作。结果，关于文档结构的信息也可以通过光标获得，这允许修改结构。使用面向光标的界面进行编辑可使开发人员更轻松地编写自定义编辑器，因为可以轻松地看到编辑操作。

trans-unit.source: Documents created from UTF-8 encoded text or the binary format are validated during parsing. If validation fails, the returned document will also be null.
trans-unit.target: 由UTF-8编码文本或二进制格式创建的文档在解析过程中会被验证。如果验证失败,返回的文档也将为空。

trans-unit.source: Does a bitwise AND operation on the source and destination pixels (src AND dst).
trans-unit.target: 对源像素和目标像素进行位与运算(src AND dst)。

trans-unit.source: Does a bitwise NAND operation on the source and destination pixels ((NOT src) OR (NOT dst)).
trans-unit.target: 对源像素和目的像素进行位运算((NOT src)OR (NOT dst))。

trans-unit.source: Does a bitwise NOR operation on the source and destination pixels ((NOT src) AND (NOT dst)).
trans-unit.target: 在源像素和目的像素上进行位运算((NOT src)AND (NOT dst))。

trans-unit.source: Does a bitwise OR operation on the source and destination pixels (src OR dst).
trans-unit.target: 对源像素和目标像素进行位OR操作(src OR dst)。

trans-unit.source: Does a bitwise XOR operation on the source and destination pixels (src XOR dst).
trans-unit.target: 对源像素和目标像素进行位XOR操作(src XOR dst)。

trans-unit.source: Does a bitwise operation where the destination pixels are inverted (NOT dst).
trans-unit.target: 在目标像素被反转(不是dst)的情况下进行位操作。

trans-unit.source: Does a bitwise operation where the source is AND'ed with the inverted destination pixels (src AND (NOT dst)).
trans-unit.target: 进行位运算,将源像素与反转的目标像素进行AND运算(src AND (NOT dst))。

trans-unit.source: Does a bitwise operation where the source is OR'ed with the inverted destination pixels (src OR (NOT dst)).
trans-unit.target: 对源像素和反转的目标像素进行位操作(src OR (NOT dst))。

trans-unit.source: Does a bitwise operation where the source is inverted and then AND'ed with the destination ((NOT src) AND dst).
trans-unit.target: 进行位运算,将源点反转,然后与目标点进行AND运算((NOT src)AND dst)。

trans-unit.source: Does a bitwise operation where the source is inverted and then OR'ed with the destination ((NOT src) OR dst).
trans-unit.target: 进行位运算,将源点反转,然后与目标点进行OR运算((NOT src)OR dst)。

trans-unit.source: Does a bitwise operation where the source pixels are inverted (NOT src).
trans-unit.target: 在源像素被反转(不是src)的情况下进行位操作。

trans-unit.source: Does a bitwise operation where the source pixels are inverted and then XOR'ed with the destination ((NOT src) XOR dst).
trans-unit.target: 对源像素进行位运算,然后与目标像素进行XOR运算((NOT src)XOR dst)。

trans-unit.source: DownloadLocation

trans-unit.source: Downloads are usually triggered by user interaction on a web page. It is the WebEngineProfile's responsibility to notify the application of new download requests, which it does by emitting the downloadRequested signal together with a newly created WebEngineDownloadItem. The application can then examine this item and decide whether to accept it or not. A signal handler must explicitly call accept() on the item for Qt WebEngine to actually start downloading and writing data to disk. If no signal handler calls accept(), then the download request will be automatically rejected and nothing will be written to disk.
trans-unit.target: 通常，下载是由网页上的用户交互触发的。这是WebEngineProfile有责任通知新的下载请求的应用程序，它通过发射downloadRequested与新创建的共同信号WebEngineDownloadItem。然后，应用程序可以检查该项目并决定是否接受。信号处理程序必须在项目上显式调用accept（），Qt WebEngine才能真正开始下载数据并将数据写入磁盘。如果没有信号处理程序调用accept（），则下载请求将被自动拒绝，并且不会将任何内容写入磁盘。

trans-unit.source: Drag and drop events are only provided if the ItemAcceptsDrops flag has been set for this item.
trans-unit.target: 仅在为此项目设置了ItemAcceptsDrops标志的情况下，才提供拖放事件。

trans-unit.source: Drag and drop is an intuitive way for users to copy or move data around in an application, and is used in many desktop environments as a mechanism for copying data between applications. Drag and drop support in Qt is centered around the QDrag class that handles most of the details of a drag and drop operation.
trans-unit.target: 拖放是用户在应用程序中复制或移动数据的一种直观方式，并且在许多桌面环境中用作在应用程序之间复制数据的机制。Qt中的拖放支持以QDrag类为中心，该类处理拖放操作的大多数细节。

trans-unit.source: Drag and drop is an intuitive way for users to copy or move data around in an application, and is used in many desktop environments as a mechanism for copying data between applications. Drag and drop support in Qt is centered around the QDrag class that handles most of the details of a drag and drop operation.
trans-unit.target: 拖放是用户在应用程序中复制或移动数据的一种直观方式,在许多桌面环境中被用作应用程序之间复制数据的机制。Qt中的拖放支持集中在QDrag类上,它处理了拖放操作的大部分细节。

trans-unit.source: Drag and drop is not limited to text and images. Any type of information can be transferred in a drag and drop operation. To drag information between applications, the applications must be able to indicate to each other which data formats they can accept and which they can produce. This is achieved using MIME types. The QDrag object constructed by the source contains a list of MIME types that it uses to represent the data (ordered from most appropriate to least appropriate), and the drop target uses one of these to access the data. For common data types, the convenience functions handle the MIME types used transparently but, for custom data types, it is necessary to state them explicitly.
trans-unit.target: 拖放不仅限于文本和图像。任何类型的信息都可以通过拖放操作进行传输。为了在应用程序之间拖动信息，应用程序必须能够相互指示它们可以接受哪些数据格式以及可以产生哪些数据格式。这是使用MIME类型实现的。由源构造的QDrag对象包含它用来表示数据的MIME类型列表（从最合适的到最不合适的顺序），而放置目标使用其中之一来访问数据。对于常见的数据类型，便捷功能处理透明使用的MIME类型，但对于自定义数据类型，必须明确声明它们。

trans-unit.source: Drag and drop is not limited to text and images. Any type of information can be transferred in a drag and drop operation. The QDrag object constructed by the source contains a list of MIME types that it uses to represent the data (ordered from most appropriate to least appropriate), and the drop target uses one of these to access the data. For common data types, the convenience functions handle the MIME types used transparently but, for custom data types, it is necessary to state them explicitly.
trans-unit.target: 拖放不仅限于文本和图像。任何类型的信息都可以通过拖放操作进行传输。为了在应用程序之间拖动信息，应用程序必须能够相互指示它们可以接受哪些数据格式以及可以产生哪些数据格式。这是使用MIME类型实现的。由源构造的QDrag对象包含用于表示数据的MIME类型列表（从最合适的到最不合适的顺序），而放置目标使用其中之一来访问数据。对于常见的数据类型，便捷功能处理透明使用的MIME类型，但是对于自定义数据类型，必须明确声明它们。

trans-unit.source: Drag and drop provides a simple visual mechanism which users can use to transfer information between and within applications.
trans-unit.target: 拖放提供了一个简单的可视化机制,用户可以使用它在应用程序之间和应用程序内部传输信息。

trans-unit.source: Drag and drop provides a simple visual mechanism which users can use to transfer information between and within applications. Drag and drop is similar in function to the clipboard's cut and paste mechanism.
trans-unit.target: 拖放提供了一个简单的可视化机制,用户可以用它在应用程序之间和应用程序内部传输信息。拖放的功能类似于剪贴板的剪切和粘贴机制。

trans-unit.source: Drawer can be configured to cover only part of its window edge. The following example illustrates how Drawer can be positioned to appear below a window header:
trans-unit.target: Drawer可以被配置为只覆盖其窗口边缘的一部分。下面的例子说明了如何将Drawer定位在窗口标题下方。

trans-unit.source: Drawer can be positioned at any of the four edges of the content item. The drawer above is positioned against the left edge of the window. The drawer is then opened by
trans-unit.target: 抽屉可以定位在内容项的四个边缘中的任何一个。上面的抽屉被定位在窗口的左边缘。然后通过以下方式打开抽屉

trans-unit.source: Drawer can have a visual background item.
trans-unit.target: 抽屉可以有一个视觉背景项目。

trans-unit.source: Drawer is a special type of popup that resides at one of the window edges. By default, Drawer re-parents itself to the window overlay, and therefore operates on window coordinates. It is also possible to manually set the parent to something else to make the drawer operate in a specific coordinate space.
trans-unit.target: 抽屉是一种特殊的弹出窗口，驻留在窗口边缘之一。默认情况下，“抽屉”会将其自身重新父化到窗口叠加层，因此将对窗口坐标进行操作。也可以手动将父对象设置为其他对象，以使抽屉在特定的坐标空间中运行。

trans-unit.source: Drawer is a special type of popup that resides at one of the window edges. By default, Drawer re-parents itself to the window overlay, and therefore operates on window coordinates. It is also possible to manually set the parent to something else to make the drawer operate in a specific coordinate space.
trans-unit.target: 抽屉是一种特殊类型的弹出窗口，驻留在窗口的一个边缘。默认情况下，“抽屉”会将其自身重新父化到窗口叠加层，因此将对窗口坐标进行操作。也可以手动将父对象设置为其他对象，以使抽屉在特定的坐标空间中运行。

trans-unit.source: Drawer is a special type of popup that resides at one of the window edges. By default, Drawer re-parents itself to the window overlay, and therefore operates on window coordinates. It is also possible to manually set the parent to something else to make the drawer operate in a specific coordinate space.
trans-unit.target: 抽屉是一种特殊类型的弹出窗口，驻留在窗口的一个边缘。默认情况下，“抽屉”会将其自身重新父化到窗口 overlay ，因此将对窗口坐标进行操作。也可以手动将父对象设置为其他对象，以使抽屉在特定的坐标空间中运行。

trans-unit.source: Drawing directly to the QOpenGLWidget's framebuffer outside the GUI/main thread is possible by reimplementing paintEvent() to do nothing. The context's thread affinity has to be changed via QObject::moveToThread(). After that, makeCurrent() and doneCurrent() are usable on the worker thread. Be careful to move the context back to the GUI/main thread afterwards.
trans-unit.target: 通过重新实现paintEvent（）不执行任何操作，可以在GUI /主线程外部直接绘制到QOpenGLWidget的帧缓冲区。上下文的线程相似性必须通过QObject :: moveToThread（）进行更改。在那之后，makeCurrent（）和doneCurrent（）在工作线程上可用。之后请小心将上下文移回GUI /主线程。

trans-unit.source: Drawing directly to the QOpenGLWidget's framebuffer outside the GUI/main thread is possible by reimplementing paintEvent() to do nothing. The context's thread affinity has to be changed via QObject::moveToThread(). After that, makeCurrent() and doneCurrent() are usable on the worker thread. Be careful to move the context back to the GUI/main thread afterwards.
trans-unit.target: 通过重新实现paintEvent（）不执行任何操作，可以在GUI /主线程外部直接绘制到QOpenGLWidget的帧缓冲区。上下文的线程亲和性必须通过QObject :: moveToThread（）进行更改。在那之后，makeCurrent（）和doneCurrent（）在工作线程上可用。之后请小心将上下文移回GUI /主线程。

trans-unit.source: Drawing slice frames is independent of drawing slices, so you can show the full volume and still draw the slice frames around it. This is useful when using renderSlice() to display the slices outside the graph itself.
trans-unit.target: 工程图切片框架独立于工程图切片，因此您可以显示完整的体积，但仍围绕其绘制工程图框架。当使用renderSlice（）在图本身之外显示切片时，这很有用。

trans-unit.source: Drawing textured quads, in order to get the contents of a texture onto the screen, is a common operation when developing 2D user interfaces. QOpenGLTextureBlitter provides a convenience class to avoid repeating vertex data, shader sources, buffer and program management and matrix calculations.
trans-unit.target: 在开发2D用户界面时，常见的操作是绘制带纹理的四边形以便将纹理的内容显示到屏幕上。QOpenGLTextureBlitter提供了一个便利类，可避免重复顶点数据，着色器源，缓冲区和程序管理以及矩阵计算。

trans-unit.source: Drawing textured quads, in order to get the contents of a texture onto the screen, is a common operation when developing 2D user interfaces. QOpenGLTextureBlitter provides a convenience class to avoid repeating vertex data, shader sources, buffer and program management and matrix calculations.
trans-unit.target: 在开发2D用户界面时,绘制纹理四边形,以便将纹理的内容呈现在屏幕上,是一种常见的操作。QOpenGLTextureBlitter提供了一个方便的类,以避免重复的顶点数据、着色器源、缓冲区和程序管理以及矩阵计算。

trans-unit.source: Dropped data is handled by a model's reimplementation of QAbstractItemModel::dropMimeData(). For example, a model that handles a simple list of strings can provide an implementation that handles data dropped onto existing items separately to data dropped into the top level of the model (i.e., onto an invalid item).

trans-unit.source: Due to a bug on some devices, when you turn off predictive text with ImhNoPredictiveText, this property is ignored and predictive text is still enabled. To work around this, set the QT_ANDROID_ENABLE_WORKAROUND_TO_DISABLE_PREDICTIVE_TEXT environment variable to 1. However, one side effect is that this environment variable can cause a problem with other keyboards such as Gboard. If you use a language like Japanese, with Gboard, only a QWERTY keyboard is displayed. This environment variable is queried each time the keyboard is displayed, so it's possible to toggle the workaround on and off, as necessary.
trans-unit.target: 由于某些设备上的错误，当您使用 ImhNoPredictiveText 关闭预测文本时，将忽略此属性，并且仍启用预测文本。要解决此问题，请将 QT_ANDROID_ENABLE_WORKAROUND_TO_DISABLE_PREDICTIVE_TEXT 环境变量设置为 1 。但是，副作用是此环境变量可能会导致其他键盘（例如Gboard）出现问题。如果您在Gboard中使用日语等语言，则仅显示QWERTY键盘。每次显示键盘时都会查询此环境变量，因此可以根据需要打开和关闭变通方法。

trans-unit.source: Due to being backed by a framebuffer object, the behavior of QOpenGLWidget is very similar to QOpenGLWindow with the update behavior set to PartialUpdateBlit or PartialUpdateBlend. This means that the contents are preserved between paintGL() calls so that incremental rendering is possible. With QGLWidget (and naturally QOpenGLWindow with the default update behavior) this is usually not the case because swapping the buffers leaves the back buffer with undefined contents.
trans-unit.target: 由于一个帧缓冲区对象被支持，行为QOpenGLWidget非常相似QOpenGLWindow与更新行为设置为 PartialUpdateBlit 或 PartialUpdateBlend 。这意味着在两次paintGL（）调用之间保留了内容，从而可以进行增量渲染。使用QGLWidget（自然是具有默认更新行为的QOpenGLWindow）通常不是这种情况，因为交换缓冲区将使后缓冲区保留未定义的内容。

trans-unit.source: Due to being backed by a framebuffer object, the behavior of QOpenGLWidget is very similar to QOpenGLWindow with the update behavior set to PartialUpdateBlit or PartialUpdateBlend. This means that the contents are preserved between paintGL() calls so that incremental rendering is possible. With QGLWidget (and naturally QOpenGLWindow with the default update behavior) this is usually not the case because swapping the buffers leaves the back buffer with undefined contents.
trans-unit.target: 由于一个帧缓冲区对象进行备份，QOpenGLWidget的行为非常相似QOpenGLWindow与更新行为设置为 PartialUpdateBlit 或 PartialUpdateBlend 。这意味着内容将在paintGL（）调用之间保留，以便可以进行增量渲染。使用QGLWidget（自然是具有默认更新行为的QOpenGLWindow）通常不是这种情况，因为交换缓冲区将使后缓冲区具有未定义的内容。

trans-unit.source: Due to how Scope and Naming Resolution works in QML, it is possible to reference the id of the application root element anywhere in its child QML objects. Even though this approach is fine for many applications and use cases, for a generic QML component it may not be acceptable as it creates a dependency to the surrounding environment.
trans-unit.target: 由于范围和命名解析在QML中的工作方式，可以在子QML对象中的任何地方引用应用程序根元素的 id 。即使此方法对于许多应用程序和用例来说都很好，但对于通用QML组件，由于它会创建对周围环境的依赖关系，因此可能不可接受。

trans-unit.source: Due to how Scope and Naming Resolution works in QML, it is possible to reference the id of the application root element anywhere in its child QML objects. trans-unit.target: 由于“作用域和命名解析”在QML中的工作方式，可以在其子QML对象中的任何地方引用应用程序根元素的 id 。即使此方法对于许多应用程序和用例来说都很好，但对于通用QML组件，由于会创建对周围环境的依赖关系，因此可能不可接受。

trans-unit.source: Due to limitations of the QRegExp API it was impossible to implement global matching correctly (that is, like Perl does). In particular, patterns that can match 0 characters (like "a*") are problematic.
trans-unit.target: 由于QRegExp API的限制，不可能正确地实现全局匹配（也就是说，像Perl一样）。特别是，可以匹配0个字符的模式（例如 "a*" ）是有问题的。

trans-unit.source: Due to limitations of the QRegExp API it was impossible to implement global matching correctly (that is, like Perl does). In particular, patterns that can match zero characters (like "a*") are problematic. QRegularExpression::wildcardToRegularExpression implements Perl global match correctly, and the returned iterator can be used to examine each result.
trans-unit.target: 由于 QRegExp API的限制，不可能正确地实现全局匹配（也就是说，像Perl一样）。特别是，可以匹配零个字符（例如“ a *”）的模式是有问题的。QRegularExpression :: wildcardToRegularExpression正确实现Perl全局匹配，并且返回的迭代器可用于检查每个结果。

trans-unit.source: Due to limitations of the QRegExp API it was impossible to implement global matching correctly (that is, like Perl does). In particular, patterns that can match 0 characters (like "a*") are problematic.
trans-unit.target: 由于QRegExp API的限制，不可能正确实现全局匹配（即，像Perl一样）。特别是，可以匹配0个字符的模式（例如 "a*" ）是有问题的。

trans-unit.source: Due to the unsorted nature of the scatter data, any change in the data window ranges requires all data points to be checked for visibility, which can cause increasing slowdown if data is continually added to the proxy. For the best performance with the scatter graphs, only keep the data you need in the proxy.
trans-unit.target: 由于散点数据的未排序性质,数据窗口范围的任何变化都需要检查所有数据点的可见性,如果数据不断添加到代理中,会导致速度越来越慢。为了获得散点图的最佳性能,请只在代理中保留您需要的数据。

trans-unit.source: Duplicate skipping is disabled by default.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下,重复跳转是被禁用的。

trans-unit.source: Duplicate skipping is not just enabled for readings that are exactly the same, but also for readings that are quite similar, as each sensor has a bit of jitter even if the device is not moved.
trans-unit.target: 重复跳过不仅对完全相同的读数启用,而且对相当相似的读数也启用,因为即使设备没有移动,每个传感器也会有一点抖动。

trans-unit.source: Duplicate skipping takes effect when the sensor is started, changing the property while the sensor is active has no immediate effect.

trans-unit.source: During a touch gesture, from the time that the first finger is pressed until the last finger is released, each touchpoint will have a unique ID number. Likewise, if input from multiple devices occurs (for example simultaneous mouse and touch presses), all the current event points from all the devices will have unique IDs.
trans-unit.target: 在触摸手势中,从按下第一个手指到松开最后一个手指,每个触摸点都会有一个唯一的ID号。同样,如果发生来自多个设备的输入(例如同时按下鼠标和触摸),所有设备的所有当前事件点都将拥有唯一的ID。

trans-unit.source: During application development it can be extremely valuable to have the Vulkan validation layers enabled. As shown in the example code above, calling QVulkanInstance::setLayers() on the QVulkanInstance before QVulkanInstance::create() enables validation, assuming the Vulkan driver stack in the system contains the necessary layers.
trans-unit.target: 在应用程序开发期间，启用Vulkan验证层可能非常有价值。如上面的示例代码所示，假设系统中的Vulkan驱动程序堆栈包含必要的层，则在QVulkanInstance :: create（）之前在QVulkanInstance上调用QVulkanInstance :: setLayers（）启用验证。

trans-unit.source: During cursor navigation in the associated editor, you can ask the current QTextBlock (retrieved using the QTextCursor::block() function) if it has a user data object set and cast it to your BlockData object. Then you can check if the current cursor position matches with a previously recorded parenthesis position, and, depending on the type of parenthesis (opening or closing), find the next opening or closing parenthesis on the same level.
trans-unit.target: 在关联的编辑器中的光标导航期间，您可以询问当前的QTextBlock（使用QTextCursor :: block（）函数检索）是否设置了用户数据对象，并将其 BlockData 为您的BlockData对象。然后，您可以检查当前光标位置是否与先前记录的括号位置相匹配，并根据括号的类型（打开或关闭），在相同级别上找到下一个打开或关闭括号。

trans-unit.source: During development, the directory for plugins is QTDIR/plugins (where QTDIR is the directory where Qt is installed), with each type of plugin in a subdirectory for that type, for example, styles. If you want your applications to use plugins and you don't want to use the standard plugins path, have your installation process determine the path you want to use for the plugins, and save the path, for example, by using QSettings, for the application to read when it runs. The application can then call QCoreApplication::addLibraryPath() with this path and your plugins will be available to the application. Note that the final part of the path (for example, styles) cannot be changed.
trans-unit.target: 在开发过程中，插件的目录为 QTDIR/plugins （其中 QTDIR 是Qt的安装目录），每种类型的插件都位于该类型的子目录中，例如 styles 。如果您希望应用程序使用插件，而又不想使用标准插件路径，请让安装过程确定要用于插件的路径，然后保存该路径，例如，使用QSettings来保存。运行时读取的应用程序。然后，应用程序可以使用此路径调用QCoreApplication :: addLibraryPath（），您的插件将对应用程序可用。请注意，路径的最后部分（例如 styles ）不能更改。

trans-unit.source: During discovery, some information can change dynamically, such as signal strength and manufacturerData. This signal informs you that if your application is displaying this data, it can be updated, rather than waiting until the discovery has finished.
trans-unit.target: 在发现期间，某些信息会动态变化，例如信号强度和ManufacturerData。该信号通知您，如果您的应用程序正在显示此数据，则可以对其进行更新，而不必等到发现完成为止。

trans-unit.source: During panning the center, and zoomLevel may change.
trans-unit.target: 在平移中心时，zoomLevel可能会更改。

trans-unit.source: During query execution, the engine iterates over the node model using nextFromSimpleAxis() to get the index of the next node to be visited. The engine can get the name of a node by calling name() with the node's index. stringValue(), baseUri(), documentUri() and kind() are also called as needed with a node index.
trans-unit.target: 在查询执行期间，引擎使用nextFromSimpleAxis（）遍历节点模型以获取下一个要访问的节点的索引。引擎可以通过使用节点的index调用name（）来获取节点的名称。还可根据需要使用节点索引调用stringValue（），baseUri（），documentUri（）和kind（）。

trans-unit.source: During startup, if a QML file includes an external JavaScript file with "global" code, it is executed in a scope that contains only the external file itself and the global object. That is, it will not have access to the QML objects and properties it normally would.
trans-unit.target: 在启动过程中，如果QML文件包含带有“全局”代码的外部JavaScript文件，则会在仅包含外部文件本身和全局对象的作用域中执行该文件。也就是说，它将无法正常访问QML对象和属性。

trans-unit.source: During startup, if a QML file includes an external JavaScript file with "global" code, it is executed in a scope that contains only the external file itself and the global object. That is, it will not have access to the QML objects and properties it normally would.
trans-unit.target: 在启动过程中，如果QML文件包含带有“全局”代码的外部JavaScript文件，则会在仅包含外部文件本身和全局对象的作用域中执行该文件。也就是说，它将无法正常访问QML对象和属性。

trans-unit.source: During the development process it is not allowed to interact with the Windows Store directly. Instead, an XML file has to be used, describing the available in-app products and the license of the application itself. Go to the MSDN documentation for more information on the format of this XML file.
trans-unit.target: 在开发过程中，不允许直接与Windows应用商店进行交互。相反，必须使用XML文件，描述可用的应用程序内产品和应用程序本身的许可证。转到MSDN文档以获取有关此XML文件格式的更多信息。

trans-unit.source: Dynamic properties can be queried again using property() and can be removed by setting the property value to an invalid QVariant. Changing the value of a dynamic property causes a QDynamicPropertyChangeEvent to be sent to the object.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用property（）再次查询动态属性，并且可以通过将属性值设置为无效的QVariant来将其删除。更改动态属性的值会导致将QDynamicPropertyChangeEvent发送到对象。

trans-unit.source: Dynamic properties can be queried again using property() and can be removed by setting the property value to an invalid QVariant. Changing the value of a dynamic property causes a QDynamicPropertyChangeEvent to be sent to the object.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用property（）再次查询动态属性，并且可以通过将属性值设置为无效的QVariant来删除动态属性。更改动态属性的值会导致将QDynamicPropertyChangeEvent发送到对象。

trans-unit.source: Dynamic properties can be queried with QObject::property(), just like properties declared at compile time with Q_PROPERTY().
trans-unit.target: 可以使用QObject :: property（）查询动态属性，就像在编译时使用Q_PROPERTY（）声明的属性一样。

trans-unit.source: Dynamic property change events are sent to objects when properties are dynamically added, changed or removed using QObject::setProperty().
trans-unit.target: 使用QObject :: setProperty（）动态添加，更改或删除属性时，会将动态属性更改事件发送给对象。

trans-unit.source: Dynamic scoping is very powerful, but it must be used cautiously to prevent the behavior of QML code from becoming difficult to predict. In general it should only be used in cases where the two components are already tightly coupled in another way. When building reusable components, it is preferable to use property interfaces, like this:
trans-unit.target: 动态作用域非常强大,但必须谨慎使用,以防止QML代码的行为变得难以预测。一般来说,它只应该在两个组件已经以另一种方式紧密耦合的情况下使用。在构建可重用的组件时,最好使用属性接口,比如这样。

trans-unit.source: DynamicParameters by default contain only the type property, and are highly plugin-dependent. For this reason, additional properties have to be defined inside a DynamicParameter at declaration time, using the QML syntax "property var foo".

trans-unit.source: EGLFS is a platform plugin for running Qt 5 applications on top of EGL and OpenGL ES 2.0 without an actual windowing system (like X11 or Wayland). In addition to Qt Quick 2 and native OpenGL applications it supports software-rendered windows (for example QWidget) too. In the latter case the widgets' contents are rendered using the CPU into images which are then uploaded into textures and composited by the plugin.
trans-unit.target: EGLFS是一个平台插件，用于在EGL和OpenGL ES 2.0之上运行Qt 5应用程序，而无需实际的窗口系统（例如X11或Wayland）。除了Qt Quick 2和本机OpenGL应用程序之外，它还支持软件渲染的窗口（例如QWidget）。在后一种情况下，小部件的内容使用CPU渲染为图像，然后将其上载为纹理并由插件进行合成。

trans-unit.source: EGLFS is a platform plugin for running Qt applications on top of EGL and OpenGL ES 2.0, without an actual windowing system like X11 or Wayland. It is the recommended plugin for modern Embedded Linux devices that include a GPU.
trans-unit.target: EGLFS是一个平台插件,用于在EGL和OpenGL ES 2.0之上运行Qt应用程序,而不需要X11或Wayland这样的实际窗口系统。它是包含GPU的现代嵌入式Linux设备的推荐插件。

trans-unit.source: EGLFS is a platform plugin for running Qt5 applications on top of EGL and OpenGL ES 2.0, without an actual windowing system like X11 or Wayland. In addition to Qt Quick 2 and native OpenGL applications, EGLFS supports software-rendered windows, like QWidget, too. For QWidget, the widgets' contents are rendered using the CPU into images, which are then uploaded into textures and composited by the plugin.
trans-unit.target: EGLFS是一个平台插件，用于在EGL和OpenGL ES 2.0之上运行Qt5应用程序，而没有像X11或Wayland这样的实际窗口系统。除了Qt Quick 2和本机OpenGL应用程序之外，EGLFS还支持软件渲染的窗口，例如QWidget。对于QWidget，小部件的内容使用CPU渲染为图像，然后将其上载为纹理并由插件进行合成。

trans-unit.source: EGLFS is the default plugin on many boards. If it's not suitable, use the QT_QPA_PLATFORM environment variable to request another plugin. Alternatively, for quick tests, use the -platform command-line argument with the same syntax.
trans-unit.target: EGLFS是许多主板上的默认插件。如果不合适，请使用 QT_QPA_PLATFORM 环境变量来请求另一个插件。另外，对于快速测试，请使用具有相同语法的 -platform 命令行参数。

trans-unit.source: EGLFS is the recommended plugin for modern Embedded Linux devices that include a GPU.
trans-unit.target: EGLFS是包含GPU的现代嵌入式Linux设备的推荐插件。

trans-unit.source: Each QAction has a menuRole property which controls the special placement of application menu items; however by default the menuRole is TextHeuristicRole which mean the menu items will be auto-detected by their text.
trans-unit.target: 每个QAction都有一个menuRole属性，该属性控制应用程序菜单项的特殊位置。但是默认情况下， menuRole 是TextHeuristicRole，这意味着菜单项将通过其text自动检测。

trans-unit.source: Each QDBusAbstractAdaptor-derived class should define the D-Bus interface it is implementing using the Q_CLASSINFO macro in the class definition. Note that only one interface can be exposed in this way.
trans-unit.target: 每个QDBusAbstractAdaptor派生的类都应使用该类定义中的Q_CLASSINFO宏定义要实现的D-Bus接口。请注意，只能以这种方式公开一个接口。

trans-unit.source: Each QInputEvent contains a QInputDevice pointer to allow accessing device-specific properties like type, capabilities and seat. It is the responsibility of the platform or generic plug-ins to discover, create and register an instance of this class corresponding to each available input device, via QWindowSystemInterface::registerInputDevice(), before generating any input event referring to that device.
trans-unit.target: 每个QInputEvent都包含一个QInputDevice指针，以允许访问设备特定的属性，例如类型，功能和座位。在生成任何引用该设备的输入事件之前，平台或通用插件有责任通过QWindowSystemInterface :: registerInputDevice（）发现，创建和注册与每个可用输入设备相对应的此类的实例。

trans-unit.source: Each QLowEnergyService instance shares its internal states and information with other QLowEnergyService instance of the same service. If one instance initiates the discovery of the service details, all remaining instances automatically follow. Therefore the following snippet always works:
trans-unit.target: 每个QLowEnergyService实例共享其内部状态和信息与其他QLowEnergyService同一服务的实例。如果一个实例启动了服务详细信息的发现，则其余所有实例将自动跟随。因此，以下代码段始终有效：

trans-unit.source: Each Place content item has an associated user who contributed the content. This type provides information about that user.
trans-unit.target: 每个地方内容项都有一个贡献内容的关联用户。此类型提供有关该用户的信息。

trans-unit.source: Each WorkerScript instance can have one .js script attached to it. When WorkerScript.sendMessage() is called, the script will run in a separate thread (and a separate QML context). When the script finishes running, it can send a reply back to the GUI thread which will invoke the WorkerScript.onMessage() signal handler.
trans-unit.target: 每个WorkerScript实例可以附加一个 .js 脚本。当WorkerScript.sendMessage（）被调用时，该脚本将在一个单独的线程（和单独运行QML上下文）。脚本完成运行后，可以将回复发送回GUI线程，该线程将调用WorkerScript.onMessage（）信号处理程序。

trans-unit.source: Each WorkerScript instance can have one .js script attached to it. When WorkerScript.sendMessage() is called, the script will run in a separate thread (and a separate QML context). When the script finishes running, it can send a reply back to the GUI thread which will invoke the WorkerScript.onMessage() signal handler.
trans-unit.target: 每个WorkerScript实例可以附加一个 .js 脚本。当WorkerScript.sendMessage（）被调用时，该脚本将在一个单独的线程（和单独运行QML上下文）。脚本完成运行后，可以将答复发送回GUI线程，该线程将调用WorkerScript.onMessage（）信号处理程序。

trans-unit.source: Each QtQuick::Sprite in this list is interpreted as corresponding to the particle group with the same name. Any transitions defined in these sprites will take effect on the particle groups as well. Additionally TrailEmitters, Affectors and ParticlePainters defined inside one of these sprites are automatically associated with the corresponding particle group.
trans-unit.target: 此列表中的每个QtQuick :: Sprite都被解释为对应于具有相同名称的粒子组。这些精灵中定义的任何过渡也会对粒子组产生影响。此外，在这些精灵之一中定义的TrailEmitters，Affector和ParticlePainters会自动与相应的粒子组关联。

trans-unit.source: Each View3D item will have at least one Scene Manager, as one is created and associated with the built-in scene root on construction. When spatial nodes are added as children of the View3D, they are registered with the View3D's scene manager. When using an imported scene, a second SceneManager is created (or referenced if one exists already) to manage the nodes that are not direct children of the View3D. This is needed because, unlike the View3D, an imported scene doesn't exist on a QQuickWindow until it is referenced. The additional SceneManager makes sure that assets belonging to the imported scene are created at least once per QQuickWindow they are referenced in.
trans-unit.target: 每个View3D项目将至少具有一个Scene Manager，因为在创建该项目并将其与构造中的内置场景根相关联时。将空间节点添加为View3D的子级时，它们已在View3D的场景管理器中注册。使用导入的场景时，将创建第二个SceneManager（如果已经存在，则进行引用）以管理不是View3D的直接子级的节点。这是必需的，因为与View3D不同，QQuickWindow上的导入场景在被引用之前是不存在的。附加的SceneManager确保每个QQuickWindow至少创建一次属于导入场景的资产。 它们被引用。

trans-unit.source: Each WebEngineView item (or QWebEnginePage object) can be in one of three
trans-unit.target: 每个WebEngineView项（或QWebEnginePage对象）可以位于以下三个项之一

trans-unit.source: Each QPlaceEditorial has a title, text and language; in addition to those properties inherited from QPlaceContent.
trans-unit.target: 每个QPlaceEditorial都有标题，文本和语言。除了从QPlaceContent继承的那些属性。

trans-unit.source: Each QPlaceImage represents a set of metadata about an image such as it's url, identifier and MIME type. These are properties in addition to those provided by QPlaceContent.
trans-unit.target: 每个QPlaceImage代表一组有关图像的元数据，例如其URL，标识符和MIME类型。这些是QPlaceContent提供的属性之外的属性。

trans-unit.source: Each QPlaceReview has a number of properties such as a title, text, date of submission and rating; in addition to those properties inherited from QPlaceContent.
trans-unit.target: 每个QPlaceReview都有许多属性，例如标题，文本，提交日期和等级。除了从QPlaceContent继承的那些属性。

trans-unit.source: Each QPointerEvent contains a QPointingDevice pointer to allow accessing device-specific properties like type and capabilities. It is the responsibility of the platform or generic plug-ins to register the available pointing devices via QWindowSystemInterface before generating any pointer events. Applications do not need to instantiate this class, they should just access the global instances pointed to by QPointerEvent::device().
trans-unit.target: 每个QPointerEvent都包含一个QPointingDevice指针，以允许访问设备特定的属性，例如类型和功能。在生成任何指针事件之前，平台或通用插件有责任通过QWindowSystemInterface注册可用的指针设备。应用程序不需要实例化此类，它们仅应访问QPointerEvent :: device（）指向的全局实例。

trans-unit.source: Each QQmlContext contains a set of properties, distinct from its QObject properties, that allow data to be explicitly bound to a context by name. The context properties are defined and updated by calling QQmlContext::setContextProperty(). The following example shows a Qt model being bound to a context and then accessed from a QML file.
trans-unit.target: 每个QQmlContext包含一组与其QObject属性不同的属性，这些属性允许将数据按名称显式绑定到上下文。通过调用QQmlContext :: setContextProperty（）定义和更新上下文属性。以下示例显示了一个Qt模型，该模型绑定到上下文，然后从QML文件进行访问。

trans-unit.source: Each QSGSimpleMaterialShader implementation operates on a unique state struct. The state struct must be declared using the QSG_DECLARE_SIMPLE_SHADER macro.
trans-unit.target: 每个QSGSimpleMaterialShader实现都在唯一的状态结构上运行。必须使用 QSG_DECLARE_SIMPLE_SHADER 宏声明状态结构。

trans-unit.source: Each QSvgWidget can be constructed with the file name of a SVG file, or they can be constructed without a specific file to render and one can be supplied later. The load() functions provide two different ways to load an SVG file: they accept either the file name of an SVG file or a QByteArray containing the serialized XML representation of an SVG file.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用SVG文件的文件名来构造每个QSvgWidget，也可以不使用要渲染的特定文件来构造它们，以后可以提供它们。所述负载（）函数提供两种不同的方式来加载的SVG文件：它们接受任何的SVG文件的文件名或一个QByteArray中含有的SVG文件的序列化XML表示。

trans-unit.source: Each QNode instance has a unique id that allows it to be recognizable from other instances.
trans-unit.target: 每个QNode实例都有一个唯一的ID，该ID使其可以从其他实例中识别出来。

trans-unit.source: Each QTextBlock object's corresponding QTextLayout object needs to be processed. You can access the QTextBlock's layout using the QTextBlock::layout() function. This processing should take the document's page size into consideration.
trans-unit.target: 每个QTextBlock对象的相应QTextLayout对象都需要处理。您可以使用QTextBlock :: layout（）函数访问QTextBlock的布局。此处理应考虑文档的页面大小。

trans-unit.source: Each QTouchEvent contains a QTouchDevice pointer to allow accessing device-specific properties like type and capabilities. It is the responsibility of the platform or generic plug-ins to register the available touch devices via QWindowSystemInterface before generating any touch events. Applications do not need to instantiate this class, they should just access the global instances pointed to by QTouchEvent::device().
trans-unit.target: 每个QTouchEvent包含一个QTouchDevice指针，以允许访问设备特定的属性，例如类型和功能。在生成任何触摸事件之前，平台或通用插件有责任通过QWindowSystemInterface注册可用的触摸设备。应用程序不需要实例化此类，它们仅应访问QTouchEvent :: device（）指向的全局实例。

trans-unit.source: Each QTouchEvent contains a QTouchDevice pointer to allow accessing device-specific properties like type and capabilities. It is the responsibility of the platform or generic plug-ins to register the available touch devices via QWindowSystemInterface before generating any touch events. Applications do not need to instantiate this class, they should just access the global instances pointed to by QTouchEvent::device().
trans-unit.target: 每个QTouchEvent都包含一个QTouchDevice指针，以允许访问特定于设备的属性，例如类型和功能。平台或通用插件有责任在生成任何触摸事件之前通过QWindowSystemInterface注册可用的触摸设备。应用程序不需要实例化此类，它们仅应访问QTouchEvent :: device（）指向的全局实例。

trans-unit.source: Each Qt Quick Controls 2 style requests a default icon size and color according to their guidelines, but it is possible to override these by setting the icon.width, icon.height, and icon.color properties.
trans-unit.target: 每个Qt Quick Controls 2样式都根据其准则要求默认的图标大小和颜色，但是可以通过设置 icon.width ， icon.height 和 icon.color 属性来覆盖它们。

trans-unit.source: Each Qt Quick Controls 2 style requests a default icon size and color according to their guidelines, but it is possible to override these by setting the icon.width, icon.height, and icon.color properties.
trans-unit.target: 每个Qt Quick Controls 2样式都根据其准则要求默认的图标大小和颜色，但是可以通过设置 icon.width ， icon.height 和 icon.color 属性来覆盖它们。

trans-unit.source: Each QWebEnginePage object has its own QWebEngineSettings object, which configures the settings for that page. If a setting is not configured for a web engine page, it is looked up in the settings of the profile the page belongs to.
trans-unit.target: 每个QWebEnginePage对象都有其自己的QWebEngineSettings对象，该对象配置该页面的设置。如果未为Web引擎页面配置设置，则在该页面所属的配置文件的设置中查找该设置。

trans-unit.source: Each QWebEnginePage object has its own QWebEngineSettings object, which configures the settings for that page. If a setting is not configured for a web engine page, it is looked up in the settings of the profile the page belongs to.
trans-unit.target: 每个QWebEnginePage对象都有其自己的QWebEngineSettings对象，该对象配置该页面的设置。如果未为Web引擎页面配置设置，则在该页面所属的配置文件的设置中查找该设置。

trans-unit.source: Each Action input can be triggered by one or many buttons on a source device
trans-unit.target: 每个Action输入都可以由源设备上的一个或多个按钮触发

trans-unit.source: Each Item can have unlimited Handlers
trans-unit.target: 每个项目可以有无限的处理人

trans-unit.source: Each Modbus server has a set of values associated with it, each with its own option.
trans-unit.target: 每个Modbus服务器都有一组与之相关的值,每个值都有自己的选项。

trans-unit.source: Each Modbus server has four tables in which it can store data.
trans-unit.target: 每个Modbus服务器都有四张表,可以存储数据。

trans-unit.source: Each Place has a favorite property which is intended to contain the corresponding place from the destination plugin (the place itself is sourced from the origin plugin). Because both the original place and favorite instances are available, the developer can choose which properties to show to the user. For example the favorite may have a modified name which should be displayed rather than the original name.
trans-unit.target: 每个Place都有一个favorite属性,它的目的是包含来自目的插件的相应地方(地方本身就来自于原插件)。因为原始地方和收藏夹实例都是可用的,开发者可以选择向用户显示哪些属性。例如,收藏夹可能有一个修改过的名字,应该显示而不是原来的名字。

trans-unit.source: Each QDBusAbstractAdaptor-derived class should define the D-Bus interface it is implementing using the Q_CLASSINFO macro in the class definition. Note that only one interface can be exposed in this way.
trans-unit.target: 每个QDBusAbstractAdaptor派生的类都应使用该类定义中的Q_CLASSINFO宏定义要实现的D-Bus接口。请注意，只能以这种方式公开一个接口。

trans-unit.source: Each QDoc comment must have a
trans-unit.target: 每个QDoc评论必须有一个

trans-unit.source: Each QLowEnergyService instance shares its internal states and information with other QLowEnergyService instance of the same service. If one instance initiates the discovery of the service details, all remaining instances automatically follow. Therefore the following snippet always works:
trans-unit.target: 每个QLowEnergyService实例与同一服务的其他QLowEnergyService实例共享其内部状态和信息。如果一个实例发起了对服务细节的发现,其余所有实例都会自动跟进。因此,下面的代码段总是有效的。

trans-unit.source: Each QML component in a QML document defines a logical scope. Each document has at least one root component, but can also have other inline sub-components. The component scope is the union of the object ids within the component and the component's root object's properties.
trans-unit.target: QML文档中的每个QML组件都定义了一个逻辑范围。每个文档至少有一个根组件,但也可以有其他内联子组件。组件范围是组件内的对象id和组件的根对象属性的联合。

trans-unit.source: Each QML component is instantiated in a QQmlContext. QQmlContext's are essential for passing data to QML components. In QML, contexts are arranged hierarchically and this hierarchy is managed by the QQmlEngine.
trans-unit.target: 每个QML组件都在QQmlContext中实例化。QQmlContext对于将数据传递到QML组件至关重要。在QML中，上下文按层次结构排列，并且此层次结构由QQmlEngine管理。

trans-unit.source: Each QML component is instantiated in a QQmlContext. QQmlContext's are essential for passing data to QML components. In QML, contexts are arranged hierarchically and this hierarchy is managed by the QQmlEngine.
trans-unit.target: 每个QML组件都在QQmlContext中实例化。QQmlContext对于将数据传递到QML组件是必不可少的。在QML中，上下文是按层次结构排列的，并且此层次结构由QQmlEngine管理。

trans-unit.source: Each QML file must contain the relevant type from the QtQuick.Templates import as the root item. For example, Button.qml must contain a Button template as its root item.
trans-unit.target: 每个QML文件必须包含来自QtQuick.Templates导入的相关类型作为根项目。例如，Button.qml必须包含一个Button模板作为其根项目。

trans-unit.source: Each QML file must contain the relevant type from the QtQuick.Templates import as the root item. For example, Button.qml must contain a Button template as its root item.
trans-unit.target: 每个QML文件必须包含来自QtQuick.Templates导入的相关类型作为根项目。例如，Button.qml必须包含一个Button模板作为其根项目。

trans-unit.source: Each QNode instance has a unique id that allows it to be recognizable from other instances.
trans-unit.target: 每个QNode实例都有一个唯一的id,允许它从其他实例中识别出来。

trans-unit.source: Each QPlaceEditorial has a title, text and language; in addition to those properties inherited from QPlaceContent.
trans-unit.target: 每个QPlaceEditorial都有标题，文本和语言。除了从QPlaceContent继承的那些属性。

trans-unit.source: Each QPlaceImage represents a set of metadata about an image such as it's url, identifier and MIME type. These are properties in addition to those provided by QPlaceContent.
trans-unit.target: 每个QPlaceImage代表一组有关图像的元数据，例如其URL，标识符和MIME类型。这些是QPlaceContent提供的属性之外的属性。

trans-unit.source: Each QPlaceReview has a number of properties such as a title, text, date of submission and rating; in addition to those properties inherited from QPlaceContent.
trans-unit.target: 每个QPlaceReview都有许多属性，例如标题，文本，提交日期和等级。除了从QPlaceContent继承的那些属性。

trans-unit.source: Each QQmlContext contains a set of properties, distinct from its QObject properties, that allow data to be explicitly bound to a context by name. The context properties are defined and updated by calling QQmlContext::setContextProperty(). The following example shows a Qt model being bound to a context and then accessed from a QML file.
trans-unit.target: 每个QQmlContext包含一组与其QObject属性不同的属性，这些属性允许将数据按名称显式绑定到上下文。通过调用QQmlContext :: setContextProperty（）定义和更新上下文属性。以下示例显示了一个Qt模型，该模型绑定到上下文，然后从QML文件进行访问。

trans-unit.source: Each QSGSimpleMaterialShader implementation operates on a unique state struct. The state struct must be declared using the QSG_DECLARE_SIMPLE_SHADER macro.
trans-unit.target: 每个QSGSimpleMaterialShader实现都在唯一的状态结构上运行。必须使用 QSG_DECLARE_SIMPLE_SHADER 宏声明状态结构。

trans-unit.source: Each QSvgWidget can be constructed with the file name of a SVG file, or they can be constructed without a specific file to render and one can be supplied later. The load() functions provide two different ways to load an SVG file: they accept either the file name of an SVG file or a QByteArray containing the serialized XML representation of an SVG file.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用SVG文件的文件名来构造每个QSvgWidget，也可以在不使用要呈现的特定文件的情况下构造每个QSvgWidget，并且可以稍后提供它们。所述负载（）函数提供两种不同的方式来加载的SVG文件：它们接受任何的SVG文件的文件名或一个QByteArray中含有的SVG文件的序列化XML表示。

trans-unit.source: Each Qt Quick Item inserts a QSGTransformNode into the scene graph tree to manage its x, y, scale or rotation. Child items will be populated under this transform node. The default renderer tracks the state of transform nodes between frames and will look at subtrees to decide if a transform node is a good candidate to become a root for a set of batches. A transform node which changes between frames and which has a fairly complex subtree can become a batch root.
trans-unit.target: 每个Qt快速项目都会在场景图树中插入一个QSGTransformNode来管理其x，y，缩放或旋转。子项将填充在此转换节点下。默认渲染器跟踪帧之间的变换节点的状态，并将查看子树以确定变换节点是否是成为一组批处理的根的良好候选者。在帧之间变化并且具有相当复杂的子树的变换节点可以成为批处理根。

trans-unit.source: Each Qt application has a global thread pool, which is accessible through QThreadPool::globalInstance(). This global thread pool automatically maintains an optimal number of threads based on the number of cores in the CPU. However, a separate QThreadPool can be created and managed explicitly.
trans-unit.target: 每个Qt应用程序都有一个全局线程池，可以通过QThreadPool :: globalInstance（）访问它。该全局线程池会根据CPU中的内核数自动维护最佳线程数。但是，可以显式创建和管理单独的QThreadPool。

trans-unit.source: Each Qt module that is loaded defines a CMake library target. The target names start with Qt5::, followed by the module name. For example: Qt5::Core, Qt5::Gui. Pass the name of the library target to target_link_libraries to use the respective library.
trans-unit.target: 加载的每个Qt模块都定义一个CMake库目标。目标名称以 Qt5:: 开头，后跟模块名称。例如： Qt5::Core ， Qt5::Gui 。将库目标的名称传递给 target_link_libraries 以使用相应的库。

trans-unit.source: Each Qt module that is loaded defines a CMake library target. The target names start with Qt6::, followed by the module name. For example: Qt6::Core, Qt6::Gui. Pass the name of the library target to target_link_libraries to use the respective library.
trans-unit.target: 加载的每个Qt模块都定义一个CMake库目标。目标名称以 Qt6:: 开头，后跟模块名称。例如： Qt6::Core ， Qt6::Gui 。将库目标的名称传递给 target_link_libraries 以使用相应的库。

trans-unit.source: Each Qt widget has a recommended size, known as sizeHint(). The layout manager will attempt to resize a widget to meet its size hint. In some cases, there is no need to have a different size. For example, the height of a QLineEdit is always a fixed value, depending on font size and style. In other cases, you may require the size to change, e.g., the width of a QLineEdit or the width and height of item view widgets. This is where the widget size constraints -- minimumSize and maximumSize constraints come into play. These are properties you can set in the property editor. For example, to override the default sizeHint(), simply set minimumSize and maximumSize to the same value. Alternatively, to use the current size as a size constraint value, choose one of the Size Constraint options from the widget's context menu. The layout will then ensure that those constraints are met. To control the size of your widgets via code, you can reimplement sizeHint() in your code.
trans-unit.target: 每个Qt小部件都有一个建议的大小，称为sizeHint（）。布局管理器将尝试调整窗口小部件的大小，以满足其大小提示。在某些情况下，不需要使用其他大小。例如，QLineEdit的高度始终是固定值，具体取决于字体大小和样式。在其他情况下，您可能需要更改大小，例如QLineEdit的宽度或项目视图小部件的宽度和高度。这是小部件大小约束-minimumSize和maximumSize约束起作用的地方。这些是您可以在属性编辑器中设置的属性。例如，要覆盖默认的sizeHint（），只需设置minimumSize和maximumSize为相同值。或者，要将当前大小用作大小限制值，请从小部件的上下文菜单中选择“ 大小限制”选项之一。然后，布局将确保满足这些约束。要通过代码控制小部件的大小，可以在代码中重新实现sizeHint（）。

trans-unit.source: Each Rectangle item is painted using either a solid fill color, specified using the color property, or a gradient, defined using a Gradient type and set using the gradient property. If both a color and a gradient are specified, the gradient is used.
trans-unit.target: 每个Rectangle项目都使用纯色（使用color属性指定）或渐变（使用Gradient类型定义并使用gradient属性设置）来绘制。如果同时指定了颜色和渐变，则使用渐变。

trans-unit.source: Each Repeater creates a number of items by combining each element of data from a model, specified using the model property, with the template item, defined as a child item within the Repeater. The total number of items is determined by the amount of data in the model.
trans-unit.target: 每个Repeater通过将使用model属性指定的来自模型的数据的每个元素与在Repeater中定义为子项的模板项进行组合来创建许多项。项目总数由模型中的数据量确定。

trans-unit.source: Each SSL socket's CA certificate database is initialized to the default CA certificate database.
trans-unit.target: 每个SSL套接字的CA证书数据库都初始化为默认的CA证书数据库。

trans-unit.source: Each action in the action group will match the visible state of this group unless it has been explicitly hidden.
trans-unit.target: 动作组中的每一个动作都将与该组的可见状态相匹配,除非它已被显式隐藏。

trans-unit.source: Each action in the group will be enabled or disabled unless it has been explicitly disabled.
trans-unit.target: 该组中的每个操作都将被启用或禁用,除非它已被明确禁用。

trans-unit.source: Each active output from the outputs array corresponds to one QScreen instance reported from QGuiApplication::screens(). By default, the primary screen that QGuiApplication::primaryScreen() reports is the screen that is registered first. If you're not using virtualIndex, this means the decision is based on the DRM connector order. To override this, set the primary property to true on the desired entry in the outputs list.
trans-unit.target: 从每个有源输出 outputs 阵列对应于一个QScreen例如从报道QGuiApplication ::屏幕（）。默认情况下，QGuiApplication :: primaryScreen（）报告的主屏幕是首先注册的屏幕。如果您未使用 virtualIndex ，则表示该决定基于DRM连接器的顺序。要覆盖此属性，请在 outputs 列表中的所需条目上将 primary 属性设置为 true 。

trans-unit.source: Each active output from the outputs array corresponds to one QScreen instance reported from QGuiApplication::screens(). The primary screen reported by QGuiApplication::primaryScreen() is by default the screen that gets registered first. When not using virtualIndex, this means the decision is based on the DRM connector order. To override this, set the property primary to true on the desired entry in the outputs list. For example, to ensure the screen corresponding to the VGA output will be the primary even when the system happens to report the HDMI one first, one can do the following:
trans-unit.target: 从每个有源输出 outputs 阵列对应于一个QScreen例如从报道QGuiApplication ::屏幕（）。默认情况下，QGuiApplication :: primaryScreen（）报告的主屏幕是首先注册的屏幕。当不使用 virtualIndex 时，这意味着决定是基于DRM连接器顺序的。要覆盖此属性，请在 outputs 列表中的所需条目上将 primary 属性设置为 true 。例如，即使系统碰巧先报告HDMI时，也要确保与VGA输出相对应的屏幕将是主要屏幕，可以执行以下操作：

trans-unit.source: Each application or library can create one or more instances of QNetworkAccessManager to handle network communication.
trans-unit.target: 每个应用程序或库都可以创建一个或多个QNetworkAccessManager实例来处理网络通信。

trans-unit.source: Each attribute of a vector3d value is stored internally as a single-precision floating point number (float).
trans-unit.target: vector3d值的每个属性在内部存储为单精度浮点数（ float ）。

trans-unit.source: Each bar set added to the series contributes a single segment to each stacked bar.
trans-unit.target: 添加到系列中的每一个条形集都为每个堆积的条形集贡献了一个单段。

trans-unit.source: Each batch uses a vertex buffer object (VBO) to store its data on the GPU. This vertex buffer is retained between frames and updated when the part of the scene graph that it represents changes.
trans-unit.target: 每个批次都使用一个顶点缓冲对象(VBO)在GPU上存储其数据。这个顶点缓冲区在帧之间保留,并在它所代表的场景图部分发生变化时更新。

trans-unit.source: Each border line (left, right, top, and bottom) specifies an offset in pixels from the respective edge of the mesh. By default, each border line has a value of 0.
trans-unit.target: 每条边线(左、右、上、下)都指定了与网格边缘的偏移量,单位是像素。默认情况下,每条边线的值为0。

trans-unit.source: Each border line (left, right, top, and bottom) specifies an offset in pixels from the respective edge of the source image. By default, each border line has a value of 0.
trans-unit.target: 每条边线(左、右、上、下)都指定了从源图像相应边缘的像素偏移量。默认情况下,每条边线的值为0。

trans-unit.source: Each call to this function must be followed by a call to QVulkanWindow::frameReady(). Failing to do so will stall the rendering loop. The call can also be made at a later time, after returning from this function. This means that it is possible to kick off asynchronous work, and only update the command buffer and notify QVulkanWindow when that work has finished.
trans-unit.target: 每次调用此函数后，都必须调用QVulkanWindow :: frameReady（）。否则，渲染循环将停止。从此函数返回后，也可以在以后的时间进行调用。这意味着可以启动异步工作，并且仅更新命令缓冲区并在完成工作时通知QVulkanWindow。

trans-unit.source: Each channel can vary between particle by up to colorVariation from its usual color.
trans-unit.target: 每个通道可以在粒子之间变化,从其通常的颜色到colorVariation。

trans-unit.source: Each cipher name in
trans-unit.target: 中的每个密码名称

trans-unit.source: Each class defined in a rep file becomes a QObject in the generated header files, with the described API generated for you.
trans-unit.target: 在rep文件中定义的每个类都将在生成的头文件中成为QObject，并为您生成所描述的API。

trans-unit.source: Each class name becomes a link to the class's reference documentation. This command is used to generate the
trans-unit.target: 每个类名都会成为该类参考文档的链接。这个命令用来生成

trans-unit.source: Each class that is a member of the specified module must be marked with the \inmodule command in its \class comment.
trans-unit.target: 属于指定模块成员的每个类都必须在其\ class注释中用\ inmodule命令进行标记。

trans-unit.source: Each code snippet is referenced by the file that holds it and by a unique identifier for that file. Snippet files are typically stored in a snippets directory inside the documentation directory (for example, $QTDIR/doc/src/snippets).
trans-unit.target: 每个代码段均由保存它的文件以及该文件的唯一标识符引用。代码段文件通常存储在文档目录内的代码 snippets 目录中（例如 $QTDIR/doc/src/snippets ）。

trans-unit.source: Each column has a minimum width and a stretch factor. The minimum width is the greatest of that set using setColumnMinimumWidth() and the minimum width of each widget in that column. The stretch factor is set using setColumnStretch() and determines how much of the available space the column will get over and above its necessary minimum.
trans-unit.target: 每列都有最小宽度和拉伸因子。最小宽度是使用setColumnMinimumWidth（）设置的最大宽度，以及该列中每个小部件的最小宽度。拉伸因子是使用setColumnStretch（）设置的，并确定该列将超过其所需的最小值的可用空间量。

trans-unit.source: Each column in an item can have its own background brush which is set with the setBackground() function. The current background brush can be found with background(). The text label for each column can be rendered with its own font and brush. These are specified with the setFont() and setForeground() functions, and read with font() and foreground().
trans-unit.target: 一个项目中的每一列都可以有自己的背景画笔，可以通过setBackground（）函数进行设置。当前背景笔刷的背景为（）。每列的文本标签可以使用其自己的字体和笔刷呈现。这些是使用setFont（）和setForeground（）函数指定的，并使用font（）和前台（）读取。

trans-unit.source: Each component of the texture can be mapped to one of the SwizzleValue options.
trans-unit.target: 可以将纹理的每个组成部分映射到SwizzleValue选项之一。

trans-unit.source: Each container typically allows its child objects to be arranged in one or more layouts. The type of layout management provided depends on each container, although setting the layout is usually just a matter of selecting the container by clicking it, and applying a layout. The table below shows a list of available containers.
trans-unit.target: 每个容器通常允许其子对象以一种或多种布局方式排列。所提供的布局管理类型取决于每个容器,尽管设置布局通常只是通过单击选择容器并应用布局的问题。下表显示了可用容器的列表。

trans-unit.source: Each dash is also subject to cap styles so a dash of 1 with square cap set will extend 0.5 pixels out in each direction resulting in a total width of 2.
trans-unit.target: 每一个破折号也受制于帽型,所以一个1的破折号,如果设置了方形的帽型,就会向每个方向延伸0.5像素,导致总宽度为2。

trans-unit.source: Each displaced item delays its animation by an additional 100 milliseconds, producing a subtle ripple-type effect when items are displaced by the add, like this:
trans-unit.target: 每一个被移位的物品都会额外延迟100毫秒的动画,当物品被添加移位时,会产生一种微妙的波纹型效果,就像这样。

trans-unit.source: Each dock area contains a single stack of tabbed dock widgets. In other words, dock widgets cannot be placed next to each other in a dock area. If this option is set, AllowNestedDocks has no effect.
trans-unit.target: 每个停靠区都包含一叠标签式停靠部件。换句话说,在一个停靠区域中,停靠部件不能相邻放置。如果设置了这个选项,AllowNestedDocks就没有效果。

trans-unit.source: Each document element is described by an associated format object. Each format object is treated as a unique object by QTextDocuments, and can be passed to objectForFormat() to obtain the document element that it is applied to.
trans-unit.target: 每个文档元素均由关联的格式对象描述。QTextDocuments将每个格式对象视为唯一对象，并且可以将其传递给objectForFormat（）以获取要应用到的文档元素。

trans-unit.source: Each document's layout is managed by a subclass of the QAbstractTextDocumentLayout class. This class provides a common interface for layout and rendering engines. The default rendering behavior is currently implemented in a private class. This approach makes it possible to create custom layouts, and provides the mechanism used when preparing pages for printing or exporting to Portable Document Format (PDF) files.
trans-unit.target: 每个文档的布局由QAbstractTextDocumentLayout类的子类管理。此类为布局和渲染引擎提供了一个通用接口。当前，默认呈现行为是在私有类中实现的。这种方法使创建自定义布局成为可能，并提供了准备打印页面或将其导出为可移植文档格式（PDF）文件时使用的机制。

trans-unit.source: Each effect has a set of properties that can be used to configure the effect output. Properties can be animated just like any other QML properties. The QML type documentation contains property descriptions and basic usage examples.
trans-unit.target: 每个效果都有一组属性,可以用来配置效果输出。属性可以像其他QML属性一样被动画化。QML类型文档包含了属性描述和基本的使用示例。

trans-unit.source: Each effect in this process can consist of multiple sub-passes, which means it is possible to render content into intermediate buffers. The final pass of a multi-pass effect is expected to output a single texture containing the color data to be used by the next steps of the post processing phase.
trans-unit.target: 这个过程中的每个效果可以由多个子通道组成,这意味着可以将内容渲染到中间缓冲区。多通道效果的最后一个通道预计将输出一个包含颜色数据的单一纹理,供后期处理阶段的下一步使用。

trans-unit.source: Each element in the list contains the lengths of the dashes and spaces in the stroke, beginning with the first dash in the first element, the first space in the second element, and alternating between dashes and spaces for each following pair of elements.
trans-unit.target: 列表中的每个元素都包含笔画中破折号和空格的长度,从第一个元素中的第一个破折号开始,第二个元素中的第一个空格开始,之后每一对元素的破折号和空格交替出现。

trans-unit.source: Each element in the vector contains the lengths of the dashes and spaces in the stroke, beginning with the first dash in the first element, the first space in the second element, and alternating between dashes and spaces for each following pair of elements.
trans-unit.target: 向量中的每个元素都包含笔画中破折号和空格的长度,从第一个元素中的第一个破折号开始,第二个元素中的第一个空格开始,之后每一对元素的破折号和空格交替出现。

trans-unit.source: Each event has an associated type, defined in QEvent::Type, and this can be used as a convenient source of run-time type information to quickly determine which subclass a given event object was constructed from.
trans-unit.target: 每个事件都有一个关联的类型，在QEvent :: Type中定义，并且可以用作运行时类型信息的便捷来源，以快速确定构造给定事件对象的子类。

trans-unit.source: Each event shall be sent to the TestCase window or, in case of multiple windows, to the current active window. See QGuiApplication::focusWindow() for more details.
trans-unit.target: 每个事件应发送到TestCase窗口，或在有多个窗口的情况下，发送到当前活动窗口。有关更多详细信息，请参见QGuiApplication :: focusWindow（）。

trans-unit.source: Each event shall be sent to the TestCase window or, in case of multiple windows, to the current active window. See QGuiApplication::focusWindow() for more details.

trans-unit.target: 每一个姓氏条目,在

trans-unit.source: Each frame contains at least one text block to enable text cursors to insert new document elements within. As a result, the QTextFrame::iterator class is used to traverse both the blocks and child frames within a given frame. The first and last child elements in the frame can be found with begin() and end().
trans-unit.target: 每个框架至少包含一个文本块，以使文本光标能够在其中插入新的文档元素。结果，QTextFrame :: iterator类用于遍历给定帧内的块和子帧。框架中的第一个和最后一个子元素可以通过begin（）和end（）找到。

trans-unit.source: Each frame has one sample per channel.
trans-unit.target: 每帧每通道有一个样本。

trans-unit.source: Each graphics object can be constructed with a parent item. This ensures that the item will be destroyed when its parent item is destroyed. Although QGraphicsObject inherits from both QObject and QGraphicsItem, you should use the functions provided by QGraphicsItem,
trans-unit.target: 每个图形对象都可以使用父项构造。这样可以确保在销毁其父物料时销毁该物料。尽管QGraphicsObject继承自QObject和QGraphicsItem，但是您应该使用QGraphicsItem提供的功能，

trans-unit.source: Each graphics object can be constructed with a parent item. This ensures that the item will be destroyed when its parent item is destroyed. Although QGraphicsObject inherits from both QObject and QGraphicsItem, you should use the functions provided by QGraphicsItem,
trans-unit.target: 每个图形对象都可以使用父项构造。这样可以确保在销毁其父物料时销毁该物料。尽管QGraphicsObject继承自QObject和QGraphicsItem，但是您应该使用QGraphicsItem提供的功能，

trans-unit.source: Each group has a parent document which is specified when the group is constructed.
trans-unit.target: 每个组都有一个父文档,在构建组时指定。

trans-unit.source: Each group in a model must have a unique name starting with a lower case letter.
trans-unit.target: 一个模型中的每个组必须有一个以小写字母开头的独特名称。

trans-unit.source: Each has certain benefits, typically performance versus quality. Using a framebuffer object avoids a costly upload of the image contents to the texture in graphics memory, while using an image enables high quality anti-aliasing.
trans-unit.target: 每种方式都有一定的好处,典型的就是性能与质量。使用framebuffer对象可以避免将图像内容上传到图形内存中的纹理上,成本很高,而使用图像可以实现高质量的抗锯齿。

trans-unit.source: Each header has an orientation() and a number of sections, given by the count() function. A section refers to a part of the header - either a row or a column, depending on the orientation.
trans-unit.target: 每个标头都有一个方向（）和多个部分，由count（）函数给定。节是指标题的一部分-根据方向是行还是列。

trans-unit.source: Each implementation of dropMimeData() must also decode the data and insert it into the model's underlying data structure.
trans-unit.target: dropMimeData（）的每个实现还必须解码数据并将其插入到模型的基础数据结构中。

trans-unit.source: Each index is adjusted for previous changes with all removed items preceding any inserted items.
trans-unit.target: 每个索引都会根据以前的变化进行调整,所有被删除的项目都在任何插入的项目之前。

trans-unit.source: Each instance of this component has access to the following properties:
trans-unit.target: 该组件的每个实例都可以访问以下属性。
